note.p: Education: Career: Freemason, 1730, at unnamed Lodge No 63 at Bear and Harrow, Butcher Row, Temple Bar, London [now St George's and Corner Stone Lodge No 5]
'Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were also Masons' Library and Museum of Freemqasonry, 2010, page 6
